articles.description: England's draw with Denmark was "baffling and concerning", according to the pundits, but what exactly is going wrong for the Three Lions?
articles.title: Denmark 1-1 England: Gareth Southgate faces questions after 'baffling' display

articles.description: Pat Cummins takes a hat-trick as Australia beat Bangladesh by 28 runs on the DLS method to start their Super 8s campaign with a win.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Pat Cummins takes hat-trick as Australia beat Bangladesh

articles.description: They may not have been favourites a couple of weeks ago – but Spain have now announced themselves as serious Euro 2024 contenders.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Spain's 'best team since 2012' after win over Italy

articles.description: Gareth Southgate's "experiment" of playing Trent Alexander-Arnold in England's midfield is surely over, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Denmark 1-1 England: 'Trent Alexander-Arnold experiment is surely over'

articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav hits a sublime half-century to help India secure a convincing 47-run win over Afghanistan in the T20 World Cup Super 8s in Barbados.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: India beat Afghanistan by 47 runs in Super 8s

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate admits his disappointment in his side's two games at Euro 2024 - despite one win and one draw.
articles.title: Denmark 1-1 England: Gareth Southgate disappointed in Euro 2024 performances

articles.description: Hungary have ridden back into contention for international honours on the back of billions of euros and one man's passion for football.
articles.title: Hungary's Euro 2024 ambitions and Viktor Orban's politics

articles.description: France boss Didier Deschamps says "everything is moving in the right direction" for Kylian Mbappe to be available to play against the Netherlands in their second Euro 2024 match on Friday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Mbappe 'moving in right direction' to be available for Netherlands game

articles.description: New British men's number one Jack Draper continues his memorable week with a notable win over Wimbledon champion Carlos Alcaraz at Queen's.
articles.title: Queen's 2024: Jack Draper beats Carlos Alcaraz in London

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris says the hope of catching Max Verstappen in the World Championship this year has grown in recent races.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix: Lando Norris says there is now more chance of catching Max Verstappen
